item.title: REDtalks #022 - IBM Cloud with Simon Kofkin-Hansen
item.description: In this episode I’m joined by Simon Kofkin-Hansen of IBM Cloud. As Distinguished Engineer of Cloud Automation, Simon travels the world enabling organizations a smooth transition towards their hybrid cloud goals.
